Joshi,

Look at the process starting in AbstractFrontier.loadSeeds(), 
which relies on the CrawlScope.seedsIterator(). That's how seeds 
are loaded into the frontier to start crawling.

Some scopes also scan the seeds file to configure their structures 
describing allowable URIs to visit. See for example the middle of 
SurtPrefixScope.readPrefixes() or 
SurtPrefixedDecideRule.readPrefixes().

Hope this helps,

- Gordon @ IA
